mapper.sql: name, type, tel1, tel2, departmentid, czman, czdate, ip, issh, remark, addressno
mapper.update:
update
set isdel=#{isdel}, type=#{type}, remark=#{remark} where find_in_set(id,#{id})

update
set name=#{name}, type=#{type}, tel1=#{tel1}, tel2=#{tel2}, issh=#{issh}, departmentid=#{departmentid}, czman=#{czman}, czdate=now(), ip=#{ip}, remark=#{remark} where id = #{id}

update
set issh=#{issh}, shman=#{shman}, type=#{type}, shremark=#{shremark}, shdate=now() where find_in_set(id,#{id})
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.name, a.type, a.tel1, a.tel2, a.departmentid, a.czman, a.shman, a.shremark, a.ip, a.issh, a.remark, a.addressno, DATE_FORMAT(a.shdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as shdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.czdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as czdate,
b.name as departmentname, c.zxxm as czname, d.zxxm as shname from a left join t_area b on a.departmentid=b.AREA_CODE left join tzxlb c on a.czman=c.id left join tzxlb d on a.shman=d.id where 1=1
and find_in_set(a.id,#{ids})

select a.id, a.name, a.type, a.tel1, a.tel2, a.departmentid, a.czman, a.shman, a.shremark, a.ip, a.issh, a.remark, a.addressno, DATE_FORMAT(a.shdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as shdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.czdate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as czdate,
b.name as departmentname, c.zxxm as czname, d.zxxm as shname from a left join t_area b on a.departmentid=b.AREA_CODE left join tzxlb c on a.czman=c.id left join tzxlb d on a.shman=d.id where a.id = #{id}
select max(addressno) as maxaddressno from t_addresslist WHERE addressno LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{keywords}),'%')
